name: Simple Platformer (Megalodon)
description:
Hello, and welcome to just a simple platformer! Run around and try to collect all the coins! (there's also a secret area too :O)

This is the first game I've ever released, so be nice please :V
(i know it looks trash, i cant find a good art creation program)

This game was created in GDevelop.
The font used in-game is called 'Louis George Cafe' and the coin sound effect is from GDevelop. Aside from that, everything here was made by me!

have fun lol
